74 /* This struct holds private data for the cbEditor class.
75  * It's a paradigm to avoid rebuilding the entire project (as cbEditor is a basic dependency)
76  * for just adding a private var or method.
77  * What happens is that we 've declared a cbEditorInternalData* private member in cbEditor
78  * and define it in the .cpp file (here). Effectively, this means that we can now add/remove
79  * elements from cbEditorInternalData without needing to rebuild the project :)
80  * The cbEditor::m_pData is the variable to use in code. It's the very first thing
81  * constructed and the very last destructed.
82  *
83  * So, if we want to add a new private member in cbEditor, we add it here instead
84  * and access it with m_pData->
85  * e.g. m_pData->lastPosForCodeCompletion
86  * and of course you can add member functions here ;)
87  *
88  * cbEditorInternalData also contains a pointer to the owner cbEditor (named m_pOwner).
89  * Using m_pOwner the struct's member functions can access cbEditor functions
90  * (even private ones - it's a friend).
91  *
92  * The same logic should be used all around the project's classes, gradually.
93  */
94 struct cbEditorInternalData
95 {
96  cbEditor* m_pOwner;
97 
98  cbEditorInternalData(cbEditor* owner, LoaderBase* fileLoader = nullptr)
99  : m_pOwner(owner),
100  m_strip_trailing_spaces(true),
101  m_ensure_final_line_end(false),
102  m_ensure_consistent_line_ends(true),
103  m_LastMarginMenuLine(-1),
104  m_LastDebugLine(-1),
105  m_useByteOrderMark(false),
106  m_byteOrderMarkLength(0),
107  m_lineNumbersWidth(0),
108  m_lineNumbersWidth2(0),
109  m_pFileLoader(fileLoader)
110  {
111  m_encoding = wxLocale::GetSystemEncoding();
112 
113  if (m_pFileLoader)
114  {
115 #ifdef fileload_measuring
116  wxStopWatch sw;
117 #endif
118  EncodingDetector enc(fileLoader);
119  if (enc.IsOK())
120  {
121  m_byteOrderMarkLength = enc.GetBOMSizeInBytes();
122  m_useByteOrderMark = enc.UsesBOM();
123  m_encoding = enc.GetFontEncoding();
124  }
125 #ifdef fileload_measuring
126  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(F(_T("Encoding via fileloader took : %d ms"),(int)sw.Time()));
127 #endif
128  }
129  }
130 
131  ~cbEditorInternalData()
132  {
133  if (m_pFileLoader)
134  {
135  delete m_pFileLoader;
136  m_pFileLoader = nullptr;
137  }
138  }

143  void StripTrailingSpaces()
144  {
145  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = m_pOwner->GetControl();
146  // The following code was adapted from the SciTE sourcecode
147 
148  int maxLines = control->GetLineCount();
149  for (int line = 0; line < maxLines; line++)
150  {
151  int lineStart = control->PositionFromLine(line);
152  int lineEnd = control->GetLineEndPosition(line);
153  int i = lineEnd-1;
154  wxChar ch = (wxChar)(control->GetCharAt(i));
155  if (control->GetLexer() == wxSCI_LEX_DIFF)
156  lineStart++;
157  while ((i >= lineStart) && ((ch == _T(' ')) || (ch == _T('\t'))))
158  {
159  i--;
160  ch = (wxChar)(control->GetCharAt(i));
161  }
162  if (i < (lineEnd-1))
163  {
164  control->SetTargetStart(i+1);
165  control->SetTargetEnd(lineEnd);
166  control->ReplaceTarget(_T(""));
167  }
168  }
169  }
170 
172  void EnsureFinalLineEnd()
173  {
174  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = m_pOwner->GetControl();
175  // The following code was adapted from the SciTE sourcecode
176  int maxLines = control->GetLineCount();
177  int enddoc = control->PositionFromLine(maxLines);
178  if (maxLines <= 1 || enddoc > control->PositionFromLine(maxLines-1))
179  control->InsertText(enddoc, GetEOLStr(m_pOwner->GetControl()->GetEOLMode()));
180  }
181 
183  void EnsureConsistentLineEnds()
184  {
185  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = m_pOwner->GetControl();
186  // The following code was adapted from the SciTE sourcecode
187  control->ConvertEOLs(control->GetEOLMode());
188  }

191  void SetLineNumberColWidth(bool both=true)
192  {
193  ConfigManager* cfg = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"));
194 
195  if (cfg->ReadBool(_T("/show_line_numbers"), true))
196  {
197  if (m_pOwner->m_pControl2 && both)
198  {
199  int pixelWidth = m_pOwner->m_pControl->TextWidth(wxSCI_STYLE_LINENUMBER, _T("9"));
200  int pixelWidth2 = m_pOwner->m_pControl2->TextWidth(wxSCI_STYLE_LINENUMBER, _T("9"));
201 
202  if (cfg->ReadBool(_T("/margin/dynamic_width"), false))
203  {
204  int lineNumChars = 1;
205  int lineCount = m_pOwner->m_pControl->GetLineCount();
206 
207  while (lineCount >= 10)
208  {
209  lineCount /= 10;
210  ++lineNumChars;
211  }
212 
213  int lineNumWidth = lineNumChars * pixelWidth + pixelWidth * 0.75;
214 
215  if (lineNumWidth != m_lineNumbersWidth)
216  {
217  m_pOwner->m_pControl->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, lineNumWidth);
218  m_lineNumbersWidth = lineNumWidth;
219  }
220 
221  lineNumWidth = lineNumChars * pixelWidth2 + pixelWidth2 * 0.75;
222  if (lineNumWidth != m_lineNumbersWidth2)
223  {
224  m_pOwner->m_pControl2->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, lineNumWidth);
225  m_lineNumbersWidth2 = lineNumWidth;
226  }
227  }
228  else
229  {
230  m_pOwner->m_pControl->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, pixelWidth * 0.75 + cfg->ReadInt(_T("/margin/width_chars"), 6) * pixelWidth);
231  m_pOwner->m_pControl2->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, pixelWidth * 0.75 + cfg->ReadInt(_T("/margin/width_chars"), 6) * pixelWidth);
232  }
233  }
234  else
235  {
236  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = m_pOwner->GetControl();
237  int* pLineNumbersWidth = nullptr;
238  if (control == m_pOwner->m_pControl)
239  pLineNumbersWidth = &m_lineNumbersWidth;
240  else
241  pLineNumbersWidth = &m_lineNumbersWidth2;
242 
243  int pixelWidth = control->TextWidth(wxSCI_STYLE_LINENUMBER, _T("9"));
244 
245  if (cfg->ReadBool(_T("/margin/dynamic_width"), false))
246  {
247  int lineNumChars = 1;
248  int lineCount = control->GetLineCount();
249 
250  while (lineCount >= 10)
251  {
252  lineCount /= 10;
253  ++lineNumChars;
254  }
255 
256  int lineNumWidth = lineNumChars * pixelWidth + pixelWidth * 0.75;
257 
258  if (lineNumWidth != *pLineNumbersWidth)
259  {
260  control->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, lineNumWidth);
261  *pLineNumbersWidth = lineNumWidth;
262  }
263  }
264  else
265  {
266  control->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, pixelWidth * 0.75 + cfg->ReadInt(_T("/margin/width_chars"), 6) * pixelWidth);
267  }
268  }
269  }
270  else
271  {
272  m_pOwner->m_pControl->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, 0);
273  if (m_pOwner->m_pControl2 && both)
274  m_pOwner->m_pControl2->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, 0);
275  }
276  }

278  void SetFoldingColWidth(bool both=true)
279  {
280  float pointSize = m_pOwner->m_pControl->StyleGetFont(wxSCI_STYLE_DEFAULT).GetPointSize();
281  if (both)
282  {
283  int width = 16 * (pointSize+m_pOwner->m_pControl->GetZoom()) / pointSize;
284  if (width < 1)
285  width = 1;
286  m_pOwner->m_pControl->SetMarginWidth(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, width);
287  if(m_pOwner->m_pControl2)
288  {
289  width = 16 * (pointSize+m_pOwner->m_pControl2->GetZoom()) / pointSize;
290  if (width < 1)
291  width = 1;
292  m_pOwner->m_pControl2->SetMarginWidth(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, width);
293  }
294  }
295  else
296  {
297  int width = 16 * (pointSize+m_pOwner->GetControl()->GetZoom()) / pointSize;
298  if (width < 1)
299  width = 1;
300  m_pOwner->GetControl()->SetMarginWidth(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, width);
301  }
302  }

304  wxString GetUrl()
305  {
306  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = m_pOwner->GetControl();
307  if (!control)
308  return wxEmptyString;
309 
310  wxRegEx reUrl(wxT("***:("
311  "((ht|f)tp(s?)\\:\\/\\/)"
312  "|(www\\.)"
313  ")"
314  "("
315  "([\\w\\-]+(\\.[\\w\\-]+)+)"
316  "|localhost"
317  ")"
318  "(\\/?)([\\w\\-\\.\\?\\,\\'\\/\\\\\\+&amp;%\\$#]*)?"
319  "([\\d\\w\\.\\/\\%\\+\\-\\=\\&amp;\\?\\:\\\\\\&quot;\\'\\,\\|\\~\\;]*)"));
320  wxString url = control->GetSelectedText();
321  // Is the URL selected?
322  if (reUrl.Matches(url))
323  return reUrl.GetMatch(url);
324  // else is there a URL near the cursor?
325 
326  // Find out start position
327  int startPos = control->GetCurrentPos();
328  const wxString space = wxT(" \n\r\t{}");
329  wxChar curCh = control->GetCharAt(startPos);
330  while ( (startPos > 0) && (space.Find(curCh) == -1) )
331  {
332  startPos--;
333  curCh = control->GetCharAt(startPos);
334  }
335 
336  // Find out end position
337  int endPos = control->GetCurrentPos();
338  int maxPos = control->GetLineEndPosition(control->GetLineCount());
339  curCh = control->GetCharAt(endPos);
340  while ( (endPos < maxPos) && (space.Find(curCh) == -1) )
341  {
342  endPos++;
343  curCh = control->GetCharAt(endPos);
344  }
345 
346  url = control->GetTextRange(startPos, endPos);
347  if ( (control->GetLexer() == wxSCI_LEX_CPP)
348  && ( (control->GetStyleAt(control->GetCurrentPos()) == wxSCI_C_STRING)
349  || (control->GetStyleAt(control->GetCurrentPos()) == wxSCI_C_STRINGEOL) ) )
350  {
351  url.Replace(wxT("\\n"), wxT("\n"));
352  url.Replace(wxT("\\r"), wxT("\r"));
353  url.Replace(wxT("\\t"), wxT("\t"));
354  }
355 
356  if (reUrl.Matches(url))
357  {
358  wxString match = reUrl.GetMatch(url);
359  if ( (url.Find(match) + startPos < control->GetCurrentPos())
360  && (url.Find(match) + startPos + (int)match.Length() > control->GetCurrentPos()) )
361  {
362  url = match(0, match.find_last_not_of(wxT(",.")) + 1); // trim trailing
363  }
364  else
365  url = wxEmptyString; // nope, too far from cursor, return invalid (empty)
366  }
367  else
368  url = wxEmptyString; // nope, return invalid (empty)
369 
370  return url;
371  }

373  static wxString GetLineIndentString(int line, cbStyledTextCtrl* stc)
374  {
375  int currLine = (line == -1)
376  ? stc->LineFromPosition(stc->GetCurrentPos())
377  : line;
378  wxString text = stc->GetLine(currLine);
379  unsigned int len = text.Length();
380  wxString indent;
381  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i)
382  {
383  if (text[i] == _T(' ') || text[i] == _T('\t'))
384  {
385  indent << text[i];
386  }
387  else
388  {
389  break;
390  }
391  }
392  return indent;
393  }
394 
400  static int DetectIndentStyle(cbStyledTextCtrl* stc)
401  {
402  int lineCount[] = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
403  // lineCount[0] == number of lines with tabs
404  // lineCount[1] == number of lines with only spaces
405  // lineCount[2 ... 8] == number of lines divisible by that number
406  // Scan 1000 lines from the middle of the file to generate statistics
407  const int maxLine = std::min(stc->GetLineCount(), stc->GetLineCount() / 2 + 500);
408  for (int line = std::max(0, stc->GetLineCount() / 2 - 500); line < maxLine; ++line)
409  {
410  const wxString& indent = cbEditorInternalData::GetLineIndentString(line, stc);
411  if (indent.IsEmpty())
412  continue;
413  if (indent.Find(wxT('\t')) != wxNOT_FOUND)
414  ++lineCount[0];
415  else
416  {
417  ++lineCount[1];
418  for (int i = 2; i < 9; ++i)
419  {
420  if (indent.Length() % i == 0)
421  ++lineCount[i];
422  }
423  }
424  }
425 
426  if (lineCount[0] > 0 && lineCount[1] == 0)
427  return 0; // tabs
428  double total = lineCount[0] + lineCount[1];
429  if (total < 10)
430  return -1; // not sure -> use defaults
431  else if (lineCount[0] / total > 0.75)
432  return 0; // tabs
433  else if (lineCount[1] / total < 0.75)
434  return -1; // not sure -> use defaults
435 
436  total = lineCount[1];
437  int tabSize = 8;
438  for (int i = 2; i < 8; ++i)
439  {
440  if (lineCount[i] > lineCount[tabSize])
441  tabSize = i;
442  }
443  if (lineCount[tabSize] / total < 0.65)
444  return -1; // not sure -> use defaults
445 
446  switch (tabSize)
447  {
448  case 2:
449  if ((lineCount[2] - lineCount[6]) / total < 0.1)
450  return 6;
451  if ( lineCount[2] > lineCount[4] * 1.8
452  || lineCount[4] / total < 0.5 )
453  return 2;
454  // fall through
455  case 4:
456  if ( lineCount[4] > lineCount[8] * 1.8
457  || lineCount[8] / total < 0.5 )
458  return 4;
459  // fall through
460  case 8:
461  if (lineCount[8] / total < 0.6)
462  return -1; // not sure -> use defaults
463  return 8;
464 
465  case 3:
466  if ( lineCount[3] > lineCount[6] * 1.8
467  || lineCount[6] / total < 0.5 )
468  return 3;
469  if (lineCount[6] / total < 0.6)
470  return -1; // not sure -> use defaults
471  return 6;
472 
473  default:
474  if (lineCount[tabSize] / total < 0.7)
475  return -1; // not sure -> use defaults
476  return tabSize;
477  }
478  }

597 // Count lines of EOL style in the opened file
598 static void CountLineEnds(cbStyledTextCtrl* control, int &linesCR, int &linesLF, int &linesCRLF)
599 {
600  linesCR = 0;
601  linesLF = 0;
602  linesCRLF = 0;
603 
604  int lengthDoc = control->GetLength();
605  const int maxLengthDoc = 1000000;
606  char chPrev = ' ';
607  char chNext = control->GetCharAt(0);
608  for (int i = 0; i < lengthDoc; i++)
609  {
610  char ch = chNext;
611  chNext = control->GetCharAt(i + 1);
612  if (ch == '\r')
613  {
614  if (chNext == '\n')
615  linesCRLF++;
616  else
617  linesCR++;
618  }
619  else if (ch == '\n')
620  {
621  if (chPrev != '\r')
622  linesLF++;
623  }
624  else if (i > maxLengthDoc) // stop the loop if the file contains too many characters
625  return;
626 
627  chPrev = ch;
628  }
629 }

631 // Detect the EOL mode of the control. If a file has mixed EOLs, we will using the voting
632 // logic, and give user a InfoWindow notification.
633 static int DetectLineEnds(cbStyledTextCtrl* control)
634 {
635  int eolMode;
636  wxString eolModeStr;
637  // initial EOL mode depend on OS
638  if (platform::windows)
639  {
640  eolMode = wxSCI_EOL_CRLF;
641  eolModeStr = _T("\"CR-LF\"");
642  }
643  else
644  {
645  eolMode = wxSCI_EOL_LF;
646  eolModeStr = _T("\"LF\"");
647  }
648 
649  int linesCR;
650  int linesLF;
651  int linesCRLF;
652  // count lines of each EOL style
653  CountLineEnds(control, linesCR, linesLF, linesCRLF);
654 
655  // voting logic
656  // if the file does not contain any line-feed or the most largest counts are equal( e.g.: linesLF=5,
657  // linesCRLF=5, linesCR=0 ), then we will use the initial EOL mode
658  if ( (linesLF > linesCR) && (linesLF > linesCRLF) )
659  {
660  eolMode = wxSCI_EOL_LF;
661  eolModeStr = _T("\"LF\"");
662  }
663  else if ( (linesCR > linesLF) && (linesCR > linesCRLF) )
664  {
665  eolMode = wxSCI_EOL_CR;
666  eolModeStr = _T("\"CR\"");
667  }
668  else if ( (linesCRLF > linesLF) && (linesCRLF > linesCR))
669  {
670  eolMode = wxSCI_EOL_CRLF;
671  eolModeStr = _T("\"CR-LF\"");
672  }
673 
674  unsigned int delay = 2000;
675  if ( ( (linesCR>0) && (linesCRLF>0) )
676  || ( (linesLF>0) && (linesCRLF>0) )
677  || ( (linesCR>0) && (linesLF>0) ) )
678  {
679  //In mixed EOL file, give the user a beep and InfoWindow notification.
680  wxBell();
681  InfoWindow::Display(_("Mixed Line Endings"), _("Mixed line endings found, setting mode ") + eolModeStr, delay);
682  }
683  return eolMode;
684 }

743 void cbEditor::DoInitializations(const wxString& filename, LoaderBase* fileLdr)
744 {
745  // first thing to do!
746  // if we add more constructors in the future, don't forget to set this!
747  m_pData = new cbEditorInternalData(this);//, fileLdr);
748  m_pData->m_pFileLoader = fileLdr;
749  m_IsBuiltinEditor = true;
750 
751  if (!filename.IsEmpty())
752  {
753  InitFilename(filename);
754  wxFileName fname(m_Filename);
755  NormalizePath(fname, wxEmptyString);
756  m_Filename = fname.GetFullPath();
757  }
758  else
759  {
760  static int untitledCounter = 1;
761  wxString f;
762  cbProject* prj = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetActiveProject();
763  if (prj)
764  f.Printf(_("%sUntitled%d"), prj->GetBasePath().c_str(), untitledCounter++);
765  else
766  f.Printf(_("Untitled%d"), untitledCounter++);
767 
768  InitFilename(f);
769  }
770 // Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(_T("ctor: Filename=%s\nShort=%s"), m_Filename.c_str(), m_Shortname.c_str());
771 
772  // initialize left control (unsplit state)
773  Freeze();
774  m_pSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
775  m_pControl = CreateEditor();
776  m_pSizer->Add(m_pControl, 1, wxEXPAND);
777  SetSizer(m_pSizer);
778 
779  // the following two lines make the editors behave strangely in linux:
780  // when resizing other docked windows, the editors do NOT resize too
781  // and they stame the same size...
782  // if commenting the following two lines causes problems in other platforms,
783  // simply put an "#ifdef __WXGTK__" guard around and uncomment them.
784 // m_pSizer->Fit(this);
785 // m_pSizer->SetSizeHints(this);
786 
787  Thaw();
788  m_pSizer->SetItemMinSize(m_pControl, 32, 32);
789 
790  // by default we show no markers, marginMasks are set explicitly in "InternalSetEditorStyleBeforeFileOpen()"
791  // and/or by plugins, that use markers, like browsemarks-plugin
792  m_pControl->SetMarginMask(C_LINE_MARGIN, 0);
793  m_pControl->SetMarginMask(C_MARKER_MARGIN, 0);
794  m_pControl->SetMarginMask(C_CHANGEBAR_MARGIN, 0);
795  m_pControl->SetMarginMask(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, 0);
796 
797  SetEditorStyleBeforeFileOpen();
798  m_IsOK = Open();
799  SetEditorStyleAfterFileOpen();
800  if (Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->ReadBool(_T("/folding/fold_all_on_open"), false))
801  FoldAll();
802 
803  // if !m_IsOK then it's a new file, so set the modified flag ON
804  if (!m_IsOK || filename.IsEmpty())
805  {
806  SetModified(true);
807  m_IsOK = false;
808  }
809  ConnectEvents(m_pControl);
810 }

812 void cbEditor::NotifyPlugins(wxEventType type, int intArg, const wxString& strArg, int xArg, int yArg)
813 {
814  if (!Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager())
815  return; // no plugin manager! app shutting down?
816  CodeBlocksEvent event(type);
817  event.SetEditor(this);
818  event.SetInt(intArg);
819  event.SetString(strArg);
820  event.SetX(xArg);
821  event.SetY(yArg);
822  if (m_pProjectFile)
823  event.SetProject(m_pProjectFile->GetParentProject());
824  //wxPostEvent(Manager::Get()->GetAppWindow(), event);
825  Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->NotifyPlugins(event);
826 }

842 cbStyledTextCtrl* cbEditor::GetControl() const
843 {
844  // return the last focused control (left or right)
845  if (m_pControl2)
846  {
847  // every time a control gets the focus it stores the actual timestamp, the timestamp defaults to 0 so the
848  // greater is the timestamp of the control that had the focus last time
849  // finding the focused window does not work if another control has the keyboard-focus
850  if ( m_pControl2->GetLastFocusTime() > m_pControl->GetLastFocusTime() )
851  return m_pControl2;
852  }
853  return m_pControl;
854 }

861 void cbEditor::SetModified(bool modified)
862 {
863  if (modified != m_Modified)
864  {
865  m_Modified = modified;
866  if (!m_Modified)
867  m_pControl->SetSavePoint();
868 
869  SetEditorTitle(m_Shortname);
870  NotifyPlugins(cbEVT_EDITOR_MODIFIED);
871  // visual state
872  if (m_pProjectFile)
873  m_pProjectFile->SetFileState(m_pControl->GetReadOnly() ? fvsReadOnly : (m_Modified ? fvsModified : fvsNormal));
874  }

884 
885 void cbEditor::SetProjectFile(ProjectFile* project_file, bool preserve_modified)
886 {
887  if (m_pProjectFile == project_file)
888  return; // we 've been here before ;)
889 
890  bool wasmodified = false;
891  if (preserve_modified)
892  wasmodified = GetModified();
893 
894  m_pProjectFile = project_file;
895  if (m_pProjectFile)
896  {
897  // update our filename
898  m_Filename = UnixFilename(project_file->file.GetFullPath());
899 
900  m_pControl->GotoPos(m_pProjectFile->editorPos);
901  m_pControl->ScrollToLine(m_pProjectFile->editorTopLine);
902  m_pControl->ScrollToColumn(0);
903  m_pControl->SetZoom(m_pProjectFile->editorZoom);
904  if (m_pProjectFile->editorSplit != (int)stNoSplit)
905  {
906  Split((SplitType)m_pProjectFile->editorSplit);
907  if (m_pControl2)
908  {
909  m_pSplitter->SetSashPosition(m_pProjectFile->editorSplitPos);
910  m_pControl2->GotoPos(m_pProjectFile->editorPos_2);
911  m_pControl2->ScrollToLine(m_pProjectFile->editorTopLine_2);
912  m_pControl2->ScrollToColumn(0);
913  m_pControl2->SetZoom(m_pProjectFile->editorZoom_2);
914  }
915  }
916 
917  m_pData->SetLineNumberColWidth();
918 
919  if ( Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->ReadBool(_T("/folding/show_folds"), true) )
920  {
921  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_pProjectFile->editorFoldLinesArray.GetCount(); i++)
922  m_pControl->ToggleFold(m_pProjectFile->editorFoldLinesArray[i]);
923  }
924 
925  m_pProjectFile->editorOpen = true;
926 
927  if (Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->ReadBool(_T("/tab_text_relative"), true))
928  m_Shortname = m_pProjectFile->relativeToCommonTopLevelPath;
929  else
930  m_Shortname = m_pProjectFile->file.GetFullName();
931  SetEditorTitle(m_Shortname);
932 
933  if (!wxFileExists(m_Filename))
934  m_pProjectFile->SetFileState(fvsMissing);
935  else if (!wxFile::Access(m_Filename.c_str(), wxFile::write)) // readonly
936  m_pProjectFile->SetFileState(fvsReadOnly);
937  }
938 
939 #if 0
940  wxString dbg;
941  dbg << _T("[ed] Filename: ") << GetFilename() << _T('\n');
942  dbg << _T("[ed] Short name: ") << GetShortName() << _T('\n');
943  dbg << _T("[ed] Modified: ") << GetModified() << _T('\n');
944  dbg << _T("[ed] Project: ") << ((m_pProjectFile && m_pProjectFile->project) ? m_pProjectFile->project->GetTitle() : _T("unknown")) << _T('\n');
945  dbg << _T("[ed] Project file: ") << (m_pProjectFile ? m_pProjectFile->relativeFilename : _T("unknown")) << _T('\n');
946  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(dbg);
947 #endif
948  if (preserve_modified)
949  SetModified(wasmodified);
950 }
951 
952 void cbEditor::UpdateProjectFile()
953 {
954  if (m_pControl && m_pProjectFile)
955  {
956  m_pProjectFile->editorOpen = true;
957  m_pProjectFile->editorSplit = m_SplitType;
958  m_pProjectFile->editorPos = m_pControl->GetCurrentPos();
959  m_pProjectFile->editorTopLine = m_pControl->GetFirstVisibleLine();
960  m_pProjectFile->editorZoom = m_pControl->GetZoom();
961  m_pProjectFile->editorSplitActive = 1;
962  if (m_pControl2)
963  {
964  m_pProjectFile->editorSplitPos = m_pSplitter->GetSashPosition();
965  m_pProjectFile->editorPos_2 = m_pControl2->GetCurrentPos();
966  m_pProjectFile->editorTopLine_2 = m_pControl2->GetFirstVisibleLine();
967  m_pProjectFile->editorZoom_2 = m_pControl2->GetZoom();
968  if (GetControl()==m_pControl2)
969  m_pProjectFile->editorSplitActive = 2;
970  }
971 
972  if (m_pProjectFile->editorFoldLinesArray.GetCount() != 0)
973  m_pProjectFile->editorFoldLinesArray.Clear();
974 
975  int i = 0;
976  while ((i = m_pControl->ContractedFoldNext(i)) != -1)
977  m_pProjectFile->editorFoldLinesArray.Add(i++);
978  }
979 }

981 void cbEditor::SetMarkerStyle(int marker, int markerType, wxColor fore, wxColor back)
982 {
983  m_pControl->MarkerDefine(marker, markerType);
984  m_pControl->MarkerSetForeground(marker, fore);
985  m_pControl->MarkerSetBackground(marker, back);
986 
987  if (m_pControl2)
988  {
989  m_pControl2->MarkerDefine(marker, markerType);
990  m_pControl2->MarkerSetForeground(marker, fore);
991  m_pControl2->MarkerSetBackground(marker, back);
992  }
993 }

999  m_pControl2->SetFoldFlags(underline ? 16 : 0);

1002 cbStyledTextCtrl* cbEditor::CreateEditor()
1003 {
1004  // avoid gtk-critical because of sizes less than -1 (can happen with wxAuiNotebook/cbAuiNotebook)
1005  wxSize size = m_pControl ? wxDefaultSize : GetSize();
1006  size.x = std::max(size.x, -1);
1007  size.y = std::max(size.y, -1);
1008 
1009  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = new cbStyledTextCtrl(this, wxNewId(), wxDefaultPosition, size);
1010  control->UsePopUp(false);
1011 
1012  m_pData->m_encoding = wxFontMapper::GetEncodingFromName(
1013  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->Read(_T("/default_encoding"), wxEmptyString) );
1014 
1015  for (int marker = 0 ; marker <= wxSCI_MARKNUM_LASTUNUSED ; ++marker)
1016  control->MarkerDefine(marker, wxSCI_MARK_EMPTY);
1017 
1018  return control;
1019 }

1021 void cbEditor::ConnectEvents(cbStyledTextCtrl* stc)
1022 {
1023  wxWindowID stcID = stc->GetId();
1024  // dynamic events
1025  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_MARGINCLICK, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnMarginClick) );
1026  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_UPDATEUI, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnEditorUpdateUI) );
1027  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_CHANGE, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnEditorChange) );
1028  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_CHARADDED, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnEditorCharAdded) );
1029  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_DWELLSTART, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnEditorDwellStart) );
1030  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_DWELLEND, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnEditorDwellEnd) );
1031  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_USERLISTSELECTION, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnUserListSelection) );
1032  Connect( stcID, wxEVT_SCI_MODIFIED, wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnEditorModified) );
1033 
1034  // Now bind all *other* scintilla events to a common function so that editor hooks
1035  // can be informed for them too.
1036  // If you implement one of these events using a different function, do the following:
1037  // * comment it out here,
1038  // * "connect" it in the above block
1039  // * and make sure you call OnScintillaEvent() from your new handler function
1040  // This will make sure that all editor hooks will be called when needed.
1041  int scintilla_events[] =
1042  {
1043 // wxEVT_SCI_CHANGE,
1044  wxEVT_SCI_STYLENEEDED,
1045 // wxEVT_SCI_CHARADDED,
1046  wxEVT_SCI_SAVEPOINTREACHED,
1047  wxEVT_SCI_SAVEPOINTLEFT,
1048  wxEVT_SCI_ROMODIFYATTEMPT,
1049  wxEVT_SCI_KEY,
1050  wxEVT_SCI_DOUBLECLICK,
1051 // wxEVT_SCI_UPDATEUI,
1052 // wxEVT_SCI_MODIFIED,
1053  wxEVT_SCI_MACRORECORD,
1054 // wxEVT_SCI_MARGINCLICK,
1055  wxEVT_SCI_NEEDSHOWN,
1056  wxEVT_SCI_PAINTED,
1057 // wxEVT_SCI_USERLISTSELECTION,
1058  wxEVT_SCI_URIDROPPED,
1059 // wxEVT_SCI_DWELLSTART,
1060 // wxEVT_SCI_DWELLEND,
1061  wxEVT_SCI_START_DRAG,
1062  wxEVT_SCI_FINISHED_DRAG,
1063  wxEVT_SCI_DRAG_OVER,
1064  wxEVT_SCI_DO_DROP,
1065  wxEVT_SCI_ZOOM,
1066  wxEVT_SCI_HOTSPOT_CLICK,
1067  wxEVT_SCI_HOTSPOT_DCLICK,
1068  wxEVT_SCI_CALLTIP_CLICK,
1069  wxEVT_SCI_AUTOCOMP_SELECTION,
1070 // wxEVT_SCI_INDICATOR_CLICK,
1071 // wxEVT_SCI_INDICATOR_RELEASE,
1072  wxEVT_SCI_AUTOCOMP_CANCELLED,
1073  wxEVT_SCI_TAB,
1074  wxEVT_SCI_ESC,
1075 
1076  -1 // to help enumeration of this array
1077  };
1078  int i = 0;
1079  while (scintilla_events[i] != -1)
1080  {
1081  Connect( stcID, scintilla_events[i], wxScintillaEventHandler(cbEditor::OnScintillaEvent) );
1082  ++i;
1083  }
1084 }
1085 
1086 void cbEditor::Split(cbEditor::SplitType split)
1087 {
1088  Freeze();
1089 
1090  // unsplit first, if needed
1091  if (m_pSplitter)
1092  {
1093  Unsplit();
1094  Manager::Yield();
1095  }
1096  m_SplitType = split;
1097  if (m_SplitType == stNoSplit)
1098  {
1099  Thaw();
1100  return;
1101  }
1102 
1103  // remove the left control from the sizer
1104  m_pSizer->Detach(m_pControl);
1105 
1106  // create the splitter window
1107  m_pSplitter = new wxSplitterWindow(this, wxNewId(), wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxSP_NOBORDER | wxSP_LIVE_UPDATE);
1108  m_pSplitter->SetMinimumPaneSize(32);
1109 
1110  // create the right control
1111  m_pControl2 = CreateEditor();
1112 
1113  // update controls' look'n'feel
1114  // do it here (before) document is attached, speeds up syntaxhighlighting
1115  // we do not call "SetEditorStyleAfterFileOpen" here because it calls SetLanguage for the already loaded text inside
1116  // the left control and slows down loading of large files a lot.
1117  InternalSetEditorStyleBeforeFileOpen(m_pControl2);
1118 
1119  // make sure basic settings of indicators (maybe set by plugins) are used for the new control
1120  for (int i = 0; i < wxSCI_INDIC_MAX; ++i )
1121  {
1122  m_pControl2->IndicatorSetStyle(i, m_pControl->IndicatorGetStyle(i));
1123  m_pControl2->IndicatorSetUnder(i, m_pControl->IndicatorGetUnder(i));
1124  m_pControl2->IndicatorSetForeground(i, m_pControl->IndicatorGetForeground(i));
1125  }
1126 
1127  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"));
1128  SetFoldingIndicator(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/folding/indicator"), 2));
1129  UnderlineFoldedLines(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/folding/underline_folded_line"), true));
1130 
1131  if (m_pTheme)
1132  m_pTheme->Apply(m_lang, m_pControl2);
1133 
1134  // and make it a live copy of left control
1135  m_pControl2->SetDocPointer(m_pControl->GetDocPointer());
1136 
1137  // on wxGTK > 2.9 we need to thaw before reparent and refreeze the editor here or the whole app stays frozen
1138  #if defined ( __WXGTK__ ) && wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
1139  Thaw();
1140  #endif
1141  // parent both controls under the splitter
1142  m_pControl->Reparent(m_pSplitter);
1143  m_pControl2->Reparent(m_pSplitter);
1144  #if defined ( __WXGTK__ ) && wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
1145  Freeze();
1146  #endif
1147 
1148  // add the splitter in the sizer
1149  m_pSizer->SetDimension(0, 0, GetSize().x, GetSize().y);
1150  m_pSizer->Add(m_pSplitter, 1, wxEXPAND);
1151 
1152  m_pSizer->Layout();
1153 
1154  // split as needed
1155  switch (m_SplitType)
1156  {
1157  case stHorizontal:
1158  m_pSplitter->SplitHorizontally(m_pControl, m_pControl2, 0);
1159  break;
1160 
1161  case stVertical:
1162  m_pSplitter->SplitVertically(m_pControl, m_pControl2, 0);
1163  break;
1164 
1165  case stNoSplit: // fall-trough
1166  default:
1167  break;
1168  }
1169 
1170  SetEditorStyleAfterFileOpen();
1171 
1172  // initial zoom is same as left/top control
1173  m_pControl2->SetZoom(m_pControl->GetZoom());
1174  // make sure the line numbers margin is correct for the new control
1175  m_pControl2->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, m_pControl->GetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN));
1176 
1177  ConnectEvents(m_pControl2);
1178 
1179  NotifyPlugins(cbEVT_EDITOR_SPLIT);
1180 
1181  Thaw();
1182 }
1183 
1184 void cbEditor::Unsplit()
1185 {
1186  m_SplitType = stNoSplit;
1187  if (!m_pSplitter)
1188  return;
1189 
1190  Freeze();
1191 
1192  // if "unsplit" requested on right control, swap left-right first
1193  if (GetControl() == m_pControl2)
1194  {
1195  cbStyledTextCtrl* tmp = m_pControl;
1196  m_pControl = m_pControl2;
1197  m_pControl2 = tmp;
1198  }
1199 
1200  // remove the splitter from the sizer
1201  m_pSizer->Detach(m_pSplitter);
1202 
1203  // on wxGTK > 2.9 we need to thaw before reparent and refreeze the editor here or the whole app stays frozen
1204  #if defined ( __WXGTK__ ) && wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
1205  Thaw();
1206  #endif
1207  // parent the left control under this
1208  m_pControl->Reparent(this);
1209  #if defined ( __WXGTK__ ) && wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
1210  Freeze();
1211  #endif
1212  // add it in the sizer
1213  m_pSizer->Add(m_pControl, 1, wxEXPAND);
1214  // notify the plugin when the right splitter window is not destroyed and the left window is reparented to cbEditor
1215  NotifyPlugins(cbEVT_EDITOR_UNSPLIT);
1216  // destroy the splitter and right control
1217  DestroySplitView();
1218  // and layout
1219  m_pSizer->Layout();
1220 
1221  Thaw();
1222 }
1223 
1224 // static
1225 wxColour cbEditor::GetOptionColour(const wxString& option, const wxColour _default)
1226 {

1236 inline void OverrideUseTabsPerLanguage(cbStyledTextCtrl *control)
1237 {
1238  if (!control)
1239  return;
1240  // override the use tab setting for Python files and Makefiles
1241  int lexer = control->GetLexer();
1242  switch (lexer)
1243  {
1244  case wxSCI_LEX_PYTHON:
1245  control->SetUseTabs(false);
1246  break;
1247  case wxSCI_LEX_MAKEFILE:
1248  control->SetUseTabs(true);
1249  break;
1250  default:
1251  break;
1252  }
1253 }

1255 void cbEditor::SetEditorStyleBeforeFileOpen()
1256 {
1257  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"));
1258 
1259  // update the tab text based on preferences
1260  if (m_pProjectFile)
1261  {
1262  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/tab_text_relative"), true))
1263  m_Shortname = m_pProjectFile->relativeToCommonTopLevelPath;
1264  else
1265  m_Shortname = m_pProjectFile->file.GetFullName();
1266  SetEditorTitle(m_Shortname);
1267  }
1268 
1269  // Folding properties.
1270  m_pData->mFoldingLimit = mgr->ReadBool(_T("/folding/limit"), false);
1271  m_pData->mFoldingLimitLevel = mgr->ReadInt(_T("/folding/limit_level"), 1);
1272 
1273  // EOL properties
1274  m_pData->m_strip_trailing_spaces = mgr->ReadBool(_T("/eol/strip_trailing_spaces"), true);
1275  m_pData->m_ensure_final_line_end = mgr->ReadBool(_T("/eol/ensure_final_line_end"), true);
1276  m_pData->m_ensure_consistent_line_ends = mgr->ReadBool(_T("/eol/ensure_consistent_line_ends"), false);
1277 
1278  InternalSetEditorStyleBeforeFileOpen(m_pControl);
1279 
1280  if (m_pControl2)
1281  InternalSetEditorStyleBeforeFileOpen(m_pControl2);
1282 
1283  SetFoldingIndicator(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/folding/indicator"), 2));
1284 
1285  SetLanguage( HL_AUTO );
1286 
1287  OverrideUseTabsPerLanguage(m_pControl);
1288  OverrideUseTabsPerLanguage(m_pControl2);
1289 }

1316 // static
1317 void cbEditor::InternalSetEditorStyleBeforeFileOpen(cbStyledTextCtrl* control)
1318 {
1319  if (!control)
1320  return;
1321 
1322  control->Colourise(0, -1);
1323 
1324  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"));
1325 
1326  // setting the default editor font size to 10 point
1327  wxFont font(10, wxFONTFAMILY_MODERN, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wxFONTWEIGHT_NORMAL);
1328 
1329  wxString fontstring = mgr->Read(_T("/font"), wxEmptyString);
1330 
1331  if (!fontstring.IsEmpty())
1332  {
1333  wxNativeFontInfo nfi;
1334  nfi.FromString(fontstring);
1335  font.SetNativeFontInfo(nfi);
1336  }
1337 
1338  control->SetMouseDwellTime(1000);
1339 
1340  int caretStyle = mgr->ReadInt(_T("/caret/style"), wxSCI_CARETSTYLE_LINE);
1341  control->SetCaretStyle(caretStyle);
1342  if (caretStyle == wxSCI_CARETSTYLE_LINE)
1343  control->SetCaretWidth(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/caret/width"), 1));
1344  else
1345  control->SetCaretWidth(1);
1346 
1347  ColourManager *colours = Manager::Get()->GetColourManager();
1348 
1349  control->SetCaretForeground(colours->GetColour(wxT("editor_caret")));
1350  control->SetCaretPeriod(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/caret/period"), 500));
1351  control->SetCaretLineVisible(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/highlight_caret_line"), false));
1352  control->SetCaretLineBackground(GetOptionColour(_T("/highlight_caret_line_colour"), wxColour(0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00)));
1353 
1354  control->SetFoldMarginColour(true, colours->GetColour(wxT("editor_margin_chrome")));
1355  control->SetFoldMarginHiColour(true, colours->GetColour(wxT("editor_margin_chrome_highlight")));
1356 
1357  control->SetWhitespaceForeground(true, colours->GetColour(wxT("editor_whitespace")));
1358 
1359  // setup for "CamelCase selection"
1360  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/camel_case"), false))
1361  {
1362  // consider CamelCase for both: cursor movement with CTRL and selection with CTRL+SHIFT:
1363  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_LEFT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL, wxSCI_CMD_WORDPARTLEFT);
1364  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_RIGHT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL, wxSCI_CMD_WORDPARTRIGHT);
1365  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_LEFT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL|wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT, wxSCI_CMD_WORDPARTLEFTEXTEND);
1366  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_RIGHT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL|wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT, wxSCI_CMD_WORDPARTRIGHTEXTEND);
1367  }
1368  else // else set default "none CamelCase" key behavior (also default scintilla behaviour, see scintilla docs)
1369  {
1370  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_LEFT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL, wxSCI_CMD_WORDLEFT);
1371  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_RIGHT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL, wxSCI_CMD_WORDRIGHT);
1372  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_LEFT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL|wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT, wxSCI_CMD_WORDLEFTEXTEND);
1373  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_RIGHT, wxSCI_SCMOD_CTRL|wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT, wxSCI_CMD_WORDRIGHTEXTEND);
1374  }
1375 
1376  control->SetUseTabs(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/use_tab"), false));
1377  control->SetIndentationGuides(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/show_indent_guides"), false)?wxSCI_IV_LOOKBOTH:wxSCI_IV_NONE);
1378  control->SetTabIndents(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/tab_indents"), true));
1379  control->SetBackSpaceUnIndents(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/backspace_unindents"), true));
1380  control->SetWrapMode(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/word_wrap"), false));
1381  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/word_wrap_style_home_end"), true))
1382  {
1383  // in word wrap mode, home/end keys goto the wrap point if not already there,
1384  // otherwise to the start/end of the entire line.
1385  // alt+home/end go to start/end of the entire line.
1386  // in unwrapped mode, there is no difference between home/end and alt+home/end
1387  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_END, wxSCI_SCMOD_NORM, wxSCI_CMD_LINEENDWRAP);
1388  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_END, wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT, wxSCI_CMD_LINEEND);
1389  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_END, wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT, wxSCI_CMD_LINEENDWRAPEXTEND);
1390  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_END, wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT|wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT, wxSCI_CMD_LINEENDEXTEND);
1391 
1392  // if user wants "Home" key to set cursor to the very beginning of line
1393  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/simplified_home"), false))
1394  {
1395  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_NORM,wxSCI_CMD_HOMEWRAP);
1396  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_HOME);
1397  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT,wxSCI_CMD_HOMEWRAPEXTEND);
1398  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT|wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_HOMEEXTEND);
1399  }
1400  else // else set default "Home" key behaviour
1401  {
1402  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_NORM,wxSCI_CMD_VCHOMEWRAP);
1403  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_VCHOME);
1404  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT,wxSCI_CMD_VCHOMEWRAPEXTEND);
1405  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT|wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_VCHOMEEXTEND);
1406  }
1407  }
1408  else
1409  { // in word wrap mode, home/end keys goto start/end of the entire line. alt+home/end goes to wrap points
1410  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_END, wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT, wxSCI_CMD_LINEENDWRAP);
1411  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_END, wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT|wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT, wxSCI_CMD_LINEENDWRAPEXTEND);
1412 
1413  // if user wants "Home" key to set cursor to the very beginning of line
1414  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/simplified_home"), false))
1415  {
1416  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_HOMEWRAP);
1417  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT|wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_HOMEWRAPEXTEND);
1418  }
1419  else // else set default "Home" key behaviour
1420  {
1421  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_VCHOMEWRAP);
1422  control->CmdKeyAssign(wxSCI_KEY_HOME,wxSCI_SCMOD_SHIFT|wxSCI_SCMOD_ALT,wxSCI_CMD_VCHOMEWRAPEXTEND);
1423  }
1424  }
1425  control->SetViewEOL(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/show_eol"), false));
1426  control->SetViewWhiteSpace(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/view_whitespace"), 0));
1427  // gutter
1428  control->SetEdgeMode(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/gutter/mode"), 0));
1429  control->SetEdgeColour(Manager::Get()->GetColourManager()->GetColour(wxT("editor_gutter")));
1430  control->SetEdgeColumn(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/gutter/column"), 80));
1431 
1432  control->StyleSetFont(wxSCI_STYLE_DEFAULT, font);
1433  control->StyleClearAll();
1434 
1435  control->SetTabWidth(mgr->ReadInt(_T("/tab_size"), 4));
1436 
1437  // margin for bookmarks, breakpoints etc.
1438  // FIXME: how to display a mark with an offset???
1439  control->SetMarginWidth(C_MARKER_MARGIN, 16);
1440  control->SetMarginType(C_MARKER_MARGIN, wxSCI_MARGIN_SYMBOL);
1441  control->SetMarginSensitive(C_MARKER_MARGIN, mgr->ReadBool(_T("/margin_1_sensitive"), true));
1442  // use "|" here or we might break plugins that use the margin (like browsemarks)
1443  control->SetMarginMask(C_MARKER_MARGIN,
1444  control->GetMarginMask(C_MARKER_MARGIN)
1445  | (1 << BOOKMARK_MARKER)
1446  | (1 << BREAKPOINT_MARKER)
1447  | (1 << BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER)
1448  | (1 << BREAKPOINT_OTHER_MARKER)
1449  | (1 << DEBUG_MARKER)
1450  | (1 << DEBUG_MARKER_HIGHLIGHT)
1451  | (1 << ERROR_MARKER) );
1452 
1453  // 1.) Marker for Bookmarks etc...
1454  control->MarkerDefine(BOOKMARK_MARKER, BOOKMARK_STYLE);
1455  control->MarkerSetBackground(BOOKMARK_MARKER, wxColour(0xA0, 0xA0, 0xFF));
1456 
1457  // 2.) Marker for Breakpoints etc...
1458  const wxString &basepath = ConfigManager::GetDataFolder() + wxT("/manager_resources.zip#zip:/images/12x12/");
1459  bool imageBP = mgr->ReadBool(_T("/margin_1_image_bp"), true);
1460  if (imageBP)
1461  {
1462  wxBitmap iconBP = cbLoadBitmap(basepath + wxT("breakpoint.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
1463  wxBitmap iconBPDis = cbLoadBitmap(basepath + wxT("breakpoint_disabled.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
1464  wxBitmap iconBPOth = cbLoadBitmap(basepath + wxT("breakpoint_other.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
1465  if (iconBP.IsOk() && iconBPDis.IsOk() && iconBPOth.IsOk())
1466  {
1467  control->MarkerDefineBitmap(BREAKPOINT_MARKER, iconBP );
1468  control->MarkerDefineBitmap(BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER, iconBPDis);
1469  control->MarkerDefineBitmap(BREAKPOINT_OTHER_MARKER, iconBPOth);
1470  }
1471  else
1472  imageBP = false; // apply default markers
1473  }
1474  if (!imageBP)
1475  {
1476  control->MarkerDefine(BREAKPOINT_MARKER, BREAKPOINT_STYLE);
1477  control->MarkerSetBackground(BREAKPOINT_MARKER, wxColour(0xFF, 0x00, 0x00));
1478  control->MarkerDefine(BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER, BREAKPOINT_STYLE);
1479  control->MarkerSetBackground(BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER, wxColour(0x90, 0x90, 0x90));
1480  control->MarkerDefine(BREAKPOINT_OTHER_MARKER, BREAKPOINT_STYLE);
1481  control->MarkerSetBackground(BREAKPOINT_OTHER_MARKER, wxColour(0x59, 0x74, 0x8e));
1482  }
1483  // 3.) Marker for Debugging (currently debugged line) etc...
1484  control->MarkerDefine(DEBUG_MARKER, DEBUG_STYLE);
1485  control->MarkerSetBackground(DEBUG_MARKER, wxColour(0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00));
1486 
1487  control->MarkerDefine(DEBUG_MARKER_HIGHLIGHT, DEBUG_STYLE_HIGHLIGHT);
1488  control->MarkerSetBackground(DEBUG_MARKER_HIGHLIGHT, control->GetCaretLineBackground());
1489 
1490  // 4.) Marker for Errors...
1491  control->MarkerDefine(ERROR_MARKER, ERROR_STYLE);
1492  control->MarkerSetBackground(ERROR_MARKER, wxColour(0xFF, 0x00, 0x00));
1493 
1494  // changebar margin
1495  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/margin/use_changebar"), true))
1496  {
1497  control->SetMarginWidth(C_CHANGEBAR_MARGIN, 4);
1498  control->SetMarginType(C_CHANGEBAR_MARGIN, wxSCI_MARGIN_SYMBOL);
1499  // use "|" here or we might break plugins that use the margin (none at the moment)
1500  control->SetMarginMask(C_CHANGEBAR_MARGIN,
1501  control->GetMarginMask(C_CHANGEBAR_MARGIN)
1502  | (1 << wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGEUNSAVED)
1503  | (1 << wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGESAVED) );
1504 
1505  control->MarkerDefine(wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGEUNSAVED, wxSCI_MARK_LEFTRECT);
1506  control->MarkerSetBackground(wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGEUNSAVED, wxColour(0xFF, 0xE6, 0x04));
1507  control->MarkerDefine(wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGESAVED, wxSCI_MARK_LEFTRECT);
1508  control->MarkerSetBackground(wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGESAVED, wxColour(0x04, 0xFF, 0x50));
1509  }
1510  else
1511  control->SetMarginWidth(C_CHANGEBAR_MARGIN, 0);
1512 
1513  // NOTE: duplicate line in editorconfigurationdlg.cpp (ctor)
1514  control->SetScrollWidthTracking( mgr->ReadBool(_T("/margin/scroll_width_tracking"), false));
1515  control->SetMultipleSelection( mgr->ReadBool(_T("/selection/multi_select"), false));
1516  control->SetAdditionalSelectionTyping(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/selection/multi_typing"), false));
1517 
1518  unsigned virtualSpace = 0;
1519  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/selection/use_rect_vspace"), false))
1520  virtualSpace |= wxSCI_SCVS_RECTANGULARSELECTION;
1521  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/selection/use_vspace"), false))
1522  virtualSpace |= wxSCI_SCVS_USERACCESSIBLE;
1523  if (!virtualSpace)
1524  virtualSpace = wxSCI_SCVS_NONE; // Just in case wxSCI_SCVS_NONE != 0
1525  control->SetVirtualSpaceOptions(virtualSpace);
1526 }

1528 // static
1529 void cbEditor::InternalSetEditorStyleAfterFileOpen(cbStyledTextCtrl* control)
1530 {
1531  if (!control)
1532  return;
1533 
1534  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"));
1535 
1536  // set the EOL, fall back value: Windows takes CR+LF, other platforms LF only
1537  int eolMode = mgr->ReadInt(_T("/eol/eolmode"), platform::windows ? wxSCI_EOL_CRLF : wxSCI_EOL_LF);
1538 
1539  if (eolMode == 3) //auto detect the EOL
1540  eolMode = DetectLineEnds(control);
1541 
1542  control->SetEOLMode(eolMode);
1543 
1544  // indentation style is already set
1545  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/detect_indent"), false))
1546  {
1547  // override style if auto-detection succeeds
1548  int indentStyle = cbEditorInternalData::DetectIndentStyle(control);
1549  if (indentStyle == 0)
1550  control->SetUseTabs(true);
1551  else if (indentStyle != -1)
1552  {
1553  control->SetUseTabs(false);
1554  control->SetTabWidth(indentStyle);
1555  }
1556  }
1557 
1558  // Interpret #if/#else/#endif to grey out code that is not active
1559  control->SetProperty(_T("lexer.cpp.track.preprocessor"), mgr->ReadBool(_T("/track_preprocessor"), true) ? _T("1") : _T("0"));
1560 
1561  // code folding
1562  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/folding/show_folds"), true))
1563  {
1564  control->SetProperty(_T("fold"), _T("1"));
1565  control->SetProperty(_T("fold.html"), mgr->ReadBool(_T("/folding/fold_xml"), true) ? _T("1") : _T("0"));
1566  control->SetProperty(_T("fold.comment"), mgr->ReadBool(_T("/folding/fold_comments"), false) ? _T("1") : _T("0"));
1567  control->SetProperty(_T("fold.compact"), _T("0"));
1568  control->SetProperty(_T("fold.preprocessor"), mgr->ReadBool(_T("/folding/fold_preprocessor"), false) ? _T("1") : _T("0"));
1569 
1570  control->SetFoldFlags(16);
1571  control->SetMarginType(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, wxSCI_MARGIN_SYMBOL);
1572  control->SetMarginWidth(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, 16);
1573  // use "|" here or we might break plugins that use the margin (none at the moment)
1574  control->SetMarginMask(C_FOLDING_MARGIN,
1575  control->GetMarginMask(C_FOLDING_MARGIN)
1576  | ( wxSCI_MASK_FOLDERS
1577  - ( (1 << wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGEUNSAVED)
1578  | (1 << wxSCI_MARKNUM_CHANGESAVED))) );
1579  control->SetMarginSensitive(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, 1);
1580  }
1581  else
1582  {
1583  control->SetProperty(_T("fold"), _T("0"));
1584  control->SetMarginWidth(C_FOLDING_MARGIN, 0);
1585  }
1586  control->SetProperty(_T("highlight.wxsmith"), mgr->ReadBool(_T("/highlight_wxsmith"), true) ? _T("1") : _T("0"));
1587 
1588  // line numbering
1589  control->SetMarginType(C_LINE_MARGIN, wxSCI_MARGIN_NUMBER);
1590 }

1645 bool cbEditor::Reload(bool detect_encoding)
1646 {
1647  // keep current pos
1648  const int pos = m_pControl ? m_pControl->GetCurrentPos() : 0;
1649  const int pos2 = m_pControl2 ? m_pControl2->GetCurrentPos() : 0;
1650 
1651  // call open
1652  if (!Open(detect_encoding))
1653  {
1654  return false;
1655  }
1656  // Re-establish margin styles, width, etc
1657  SetEditorStyleAfterFileOpen();
1658 
1659  // return (if possible) to old pos
1660  if (m_pControl)
1661  {
1662  m_pControl->GotoPos(pos);
1663  }
1664  if (m_pControl2)
1665  {
1666  m_pControl2->GotoPos(pos2);
1667  }
1668  return true;
1669 } // end of Reload

1680  else
1681  m_lang = HL_AUTO;
1682 }
1683 
1684 bool cbEditor::Open(bool detectEncoding)
1685 {
1686  if (m_pProjectFile)
1687  {
1688  if (!wxFileExists(m_Filename))
1689  m_pProjectFile->SetFileState(fvsMissing);
1690  else if (!wxFile::Access(m_Filename.c_str(), wxFile::write)) // readonly
1691  m_pProjectFile->SetFileState(fvsReadOnly);
1692  }
1693 
1694  if (!wxFileExists(m_Filename))
1695  return false;
1696 
1697  // open file
1698  SetReadOnly(false);
1699 
1700  m_pControl->ClearAll();
1701  m_pControl->SetModEventMask(0);
1702 
1703  if (!m_pData)
1704  return false;
1705 
1706  if (!m_pData->m_pFileLoader)
1707  m_pData->m_pFileLoader = Manager::Get()->GetFileManager()->Load(m_Filename, false);
1708 
1709 #ifdef fileload_measuring
1710  wxStopWatch sw;
1711 #endif
1712  EncodingDetector enc((wxByte*)m_pData->m_pFileLoader->GetData(), m_pData->m_pFileLoader->GetLength());
1713  if (detectEncoding)
1714  {
1715  m_pData->m_useByteOrderMark = enc.UsesBOM();
1716  m_pData->m_byteOrderMarkLength = enc.GetBOMSizeInBytes();
1717  m_pData->m_encoding = enc.GetFontEncoding();
1718 
1719  SetEncoding(enc.GetFontEncoding());
1720  SetUseBom(m_pData->m_byteOrderMarkLength > 0);
1721  }
1722 
1723  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"));
1724 #ifdef fileload_measuring
1725  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(F(_T("cbEditor::Open() => Encoding detection and conversion took : %d ms"),(int)sw.Time()));
1726  sw.Start();
1727 #endif
1728 
1729  m_pControl->InsertText(0, enc.GetWxStr());
1730  m_pControl->EmptyUndoBuffer(mgr->ReadBool(_T("/margin/use_changebar"), true));
1731  m_pControl->SetModEventMask(wxSCI_MODEVENTMASKALL);
1732 
1733  // mark the file read-only, if applicable
1734  bool read_only = !wxFile::Access(m_Filename.c_str(), wxFile::write);
1735  SetReadOnly(read_only);
1736 
1737  wxFileName fname(m_Filename);
1738  m_LastModified = fname.GetModificationTime();
1739 
1740  SetModified(false);
1741 
1742  NotifyPlugins(cbEVT_EDITOR_OPEN);
1743 
1744  if (m_pData->m_pFileLoader)
1745  {
1746  delete m_pData->m_pFileLoader;
1747  m_pData->m_pFileLoader = nullptr;
1748  }
1749 #ifdef fileload_measuring
1750  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(F(_T("loading into editor needs : %d ms"),(int)sw.Time()));
1751 #endif
1752  return true;
1753 }
1754 
1755 bool cbEditor::Save()
1756 {
1757  if ( !GetModified() )
1758  return true;
1759 
1760  // remember current column (caret and anchor)
1761  int columnC = m_pControl->GetColumn(m_pControl->GetCurrentPos());
1762  int columnA = m_pControl->GetColumn(m_pControl->GetAnchor());
1763 
1764  // one undo action for all modifications in this context
1765  // (angled braces added for clarity)
1766  m_pControl->BeginUndoAction();
1767  {
1768  if (m_pData->m_strip_trailing_spaces)
1769  m_pData->StripTrailingSpaces();
1770  if (m_pData->m_ensure_consistent_line_ends)
1771  m_pData->EnsureConsistentLineEnds();
1772  if (m_pData->m_ensure_final_line_end)
1773  m_pData->EnsureFinalLineEnd();
1774  }
1775  m_pControl->EndUndoAction();
1776 
1777  // restore virtual position ( if changed by StripTrailingSpaces() )
1778  columnC -= m_pControl->GetColumn(m_pControl->GetCurrentPos());
1779  columnA -= m_pControl->GetColumn(m_pControl->GetAnchor());
1780  if (columnC > 0)
1781  m_pControl->SetSelectionNCaretVirtualSpace(0, columnC);
1782  if (columnA > 0)
1783  m_pControl->SetSelectionNAnchorVirtualSpace(0, columnA);
1784 
1785  if (!m_IsOK)
1786  return SaveAs();
1787 
1788  m_pControl->BeginUndoAction();
1789  NotifyPlugins(cbEVT_EDITOR_BEFORE_SAVE);
1790  m_pControl->EndUndoAction();
1791 
1792  if ( !cbSaveToFile(m_Filename, m_pControl->GetText(), GetEncoding(), GetUseBom()) )
1793  {
1794  wxString msg;
1795  msg.Printf(_("File %s could not be saved..."), GetFilename().c_str());
1796  cbMessageBox(msg, _("Error saving file"), wxICON_ERROR);
1797  return false; // failed; file is read-only?
1798  }
1799 
1800  wxFileName fname(m_Filename);
1801  m_LastModified = fname.GetModificationTime();
1802 
1803  m_IsOK = true;
1804 
1805  m_pControl->SetSavePoint();
1806  SetModified(false);
1807 
1808  NotifyPlugins(cbEVT_EDITOR_SAVE);
1809  return true;
1810 } // end of Save
1811 
1812 bool cbEditor::SaveAs()
1813 {
1814  wxFileName fname;
1815  fname.Assign(m_Filename);
1816  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"));
1817  int StoredIndex = 0;
1818  wxString Filters = FileFilters::GetFilterString();
1819  wxString Path = fname.GetPath();
1820  wxString Extension = fname.GetExt();
1821  wxString Filter;
1822  if (!Extension.IsEmpty())
1823  { // use the current extension as the filter
1824  // Select filter belonging to this file type:
1825  Extension.Prepend(_T("."));
1826  Filter = FileFilters::GetFilterString(Extension);
1827  }
1828  else if (mgr)
1829  {
1830  // File type is unknown. Select the last used filter:
1831  Filter = mgr->Read(_T("/file_dialogs/save_file_as/filter"), _T("C/C++ files"));
1832  }
1833  if (!Filter.IsEmpty())
1834  {
1835  // We found a filter, look up its index:
1836  int sep = Filter.find(_T("|"));
1837  if (sep != wxNOT_FOUND)
1838  Filter.Truncate(sep);
1839  if (!Filter.IsEmpty())
1840  FileFilters::GetFilterIndexFromName(Filters, Filter, StoredIndex);
1841  }
1842  if (mgr && Path.IsEmpty())
1843  Path = mgr->Read(_T("/file_dialogs/save_file_as/directory"), Path);
1844 
1845  wxFileDialog dlg(Manager::Get()->GetAppWindow(),
1846  _("Save file"),
1847  Path,
1848  fname.GetFullName(),
1849  Filters,
1850  wxFD_SAVE | wxFD_OVERWRITE_PROMPT);
1851  dlg.SetFilterIndex(StoredIndex);
1852  PlaceWindow(&dlg);
1853  if (dlg.ShowModal() != wxID_OK)
1854  { // cancelled out
1855  return false;
1856  }
1857  m_Filename = dlg.GetPath();
1858  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->Log(m_Filename);
1859  fname.Assign(m_Filename);
1860  m_Shortname = fname.GetFullName();
1861  SetEditorTitle(m_Shortname);
1862  // invalidate m_pProjectFile, because if kept, it would point to the ProjectFile with old name and
1863  // cause ProjectManager::RemoveFileFromProject called via context menu to crash
1864  SetProjectFile(nullptr);
1865  //Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->Log(mltDevDebug, "Filename=%s\nShort=%s", m_Filename.c_str(), m_Shortname.c_str());
1866  m_IsOK = true;
1867  SetLanguage( HL_AUTO );
1868  SetModified(true);
1869  SetEditorStyleAfterFileOpen();
1870  OverrideUseTabsPerLanguage(m_pControl);
1871  OverrideUseTabsPerLanguage(m_pControl2);
1872  // store the last used filter and directory
1873  if (mgr)
1874  {
1875  int Index = dlg.GetFilterIndex();
1876  Filter.Empty();
1877  if (FileFilters::GetFilterNameFromIndex(Filters, Index, Filter))
1878  mgr->Write(_T("/file_dialogs/save_file_as/filter"), Filter);
1879  wxString Test = dlg.GetDirectory();
1880  mgr->Write(_T("/file_dialogs/save_file_as/directory"), dlg.GetDirectory());
1881  }
1882  return Save();
1883 } // end of SaveAs

1885 bool cbEditor::SaveFoldState()
1886 {
1887  bool bRet = false;
1888  if ((m_foldBackup = CreateEditor()))
1889  {
1890  ApplyStyles(m_foldBackup);
1891  m_foldBackup->SetText(m_pControl->GetText());
1892  int count = m_pControl->GetLineCount();
1893  for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i)
1894  m_foldBackup->SetFoldLevel(i,m_pControl->GetFoldLevel(i));
1895  bRet = true;
1896  }
1897  return bRet;
1898 } // end of SaveFoldState

1900 bool cbEditor::FixFoldState()
1901 {
1902  bool bRet = false;
1903  if (m_foldBackup)
1904  {
1905  int backupLength = m_foldBackup->GetLineCount();
1906  int realLength = m_pControl->GetLineCount();
1907  if (backupLength == realLength) // It is supposed to be the same, but you never know :)
1908  {
1909  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"));
1910  if (mgr->ReadBool(_T("/folding/show_folds"), true)) // Only fix the folds if the folds are enabled
1911  {
1912  int count = m_pControl->GetLineCount();
1913  for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i)
1914  {
1915  int oldFoldLevel = m_foldBackup->GetFoldLevel(i);
1916  int newFoldLevel = m_pControl->GetFoldLevel(i);
1917  if (oldFoldLevel != newFoldLevel)
1918  {
1919  if (m_pControl->GetLineVisible(i) == true)
1920  m_pControl->SetFoldExpanded(i, true);
1921  else
1922  {
1923  int parent = m_foldBackup->GetFoldParent(i);
1924  while(parent != -1)
1925  {
1926  m_pControl->ToggleFold(parent);
1927  parent = m_foldBackup->GetFoldParent(parent);
1928  }
1929  m_pControl->ShowLines(i, i);
1930  parent = m_foldBackup->GetFoldParent(i);
1931  while(parent != -1)
1932  {
1933  m_pControl->ToggleFold(parent);
1934  parent = m_foldBackup->GetFoldParent(parent);
1935  }
1936  }
1937  }
1938  }
1939  }
1940  bRet = true;
1941  }
1942  m_foldBackup->Destroy();
1943  m_foldBackup = nullptr;
1944  }
1945  return bRet;
1946 } // end of FixFoldState

1953 void cbEditor::DoFoldAll(int fold)
1954 {
1955  cbAssert(m_pControl);
1956  if (m_SplitType != stNoSplit)
1957  cbAssert(m_pControl2);
1958  cbStyledTextCtrl* ctrl = GetControl();
1959  ctrl->Colourise(0, -1); // the *most* important part!
1960  int count = ctrl->GetLineCount();
1961  for (int i = 0; i <= count; ++i)
1962  DoFoldLine(i, fold);
1963 }
1964 
1965 void cbEditor::DoFoldBlockFromLine(int line, int fold)
1966 {
1967  cbAssert(m_pControl);
1968  if (m_SplitType != stNoSplit)
1969  cbAssert(m_pControl2);
1970  cbStyledTextCtrl* ctrl = GetControl();
1971  ctrl->Colourise(0, -1); // the *most* important part!
1972  int i, parent, maxLine, level, UnfoldUpto = line;
1973 
1974  parent = ctrl->GetFoldParent(line);
1975  level = ctrl->GetFoldLevel(parent);
1976  /* The following code will check if the child is hidden
1977  * under parent before unfolding it
1978  */
1979  if (fold == 0)
1980  {
1981  do
1982  {
1983  if (!ctrl->GetFoldExpanded(parent))
1984  UnfoldUpto = parent;
1985  if (wxSCI_FOLDLEVELBASE == (level & wxSCI_FOLDLEVELNUMBERMASK))
1986  break;
1987  parent = ctrl->GetFoldParent(parent);
1988  level = ctrl->GetFoldLevel(parent);
1989  }
1990  while (parent != -1);
1991  }
1992 
1993  maxLine = ctrl->GetLastChild(line, -1);
1994 
1995  for (i = UnfoldUpto; i <= maxLine; ++i)
1996  DoFoldLine(i, fold);
1997 }
1998 
1999 bool cbEditor::DoFoldLine(int line, int fold)
2000 {
2001  cbAssert(m_pControl);
2002  if (m_SplitType != stNoSplit)
2003  cbAssert(m_pControl2);
2004  cbStyledTextCtrl* ctrl = GetControl();
2005  int level = ctrl->GetFoldLevel(line);
2006 
2007  // The fold parameter is the type of folding action requested
2008  // 0 = Unfold; 1 = Fold; 2 = Toggle folding.
2009 
2010  // Check if the line is a header (fold point).
2011  if (level & wxSCI_FOLDLEVELHEADERFLAG)
2012  {
2013  bool IsExpanded = ctrl->GetFoldExpanded(line);
2014 
2015  // If a fold/unfold request is issued when the block is already
2016  // folded/unfolded, ignore the request.
2017  if (fold == 0 && IsExpanded) return true;
2018  if (fold == 1 && !IsExpanded) return true;
2019 
2020  // Apply the folding level limit only if the current block will be
2021  // folded (that means it's currently expanded), folding level limiter
2022  // must be enabled of course. Unfolding will not be affected.
2023  if (m_pData->mFoldingLimit && IsExpanded)
2024  {
2025  if ((level & wxSCI_FOLDLEVELNUMBERMASK) > (wxSCI_FOLDLEVELBASE + m_pData->mFoldingLimitLevel-1))
2026  return false;
2027  }
2028 
2029  ctrl->ToggleFold(line);
2030  return true;
2031  }
2032  return false;
2033 }
2034 
2035 void cbEditor::FoldAll()
2036 {
2037  DoFoldAll(1);
2038 }
2039 
2040 void cbEditor::UnfoldAll()
2041 {
2042  DoFoldAll(0);
2043 }

2045 void cbEditor::ToggleAllFolds()
2046 {

2121 void cbEditor::GotoLine(int line, bool centerOnScreen)
2122 {
2123  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
2124 
2125  // Make sure the line is not folded. This is done before moving to that
2126  // line because folding may change the lines layout.
2127  control->EnsureVisible(line);
2128 
2129  // If the line or the following is a fold point it will be unfolded, in this way
2130  // when the line is a function declaration (or only contains the opening brace of it [yes, that happens sometimes] )
2131  // the body is shown.
2132  DoFoldLine(line,0);
2133  DoFoldLine(line+1,0);
2134 
2135  if (centerOnScreen)
2136  {
2137  int linesOnScreen = control->LinesOnScreen() >> 1;
2138  int firstVisibleLine = control->GetFirstVisibleLine();
2139  if ( (line < firstVisibleLine)
2140  || (line > (firstVisibleLine + 2*linesOnScreen)) )
2141  {
2142  control->GotoLine(line - linesOnScreen);
2143  control->GotoLine(line + linesOnScreen);
2144  }
2145  }
2146  control->GotoLine(line);
2147 }
2148 
2149 bool cbEditor::GotoTokenPosition(int line, const wxString& tokenName)
2150 {
2151  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
2152  if (line > control->GetLineCount())
2153  return false;
2154 
2155  GotoLine(line, true); // center function on screen
2156  SetFocus(); // ...and set focus to this editor
2157 
2158  // Now highlight the token
2159  const int startPos = control->GetCurrentPos();
2160  const int endPos = startPos + control->LineLength(line);
2161  if (endPos <= startPos)
2162  return false;
2163 
2164  int tokenPos = control->FindText(startPos, endPos, tokenName,
2165  wxSCI_FIND_WHOLEWORD | wxSCI_FIND_MATCHCASE, nullptr);
2166  if (tokenPos != wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION)
2167  control->SetSelectionInt(tokenPos, tokenPos + tokenName.Len());
2168  else
2169  control->GotoPos(startPos); // fall back, point the cursor to it
2170 
2171  return true;
2172 }

2174 void cbEditor::BreakpointMarkerToggle(int line)

2177  if (marker & (1 << BREAKPOINT_MARKER))
2178  m_pControl->MarkerDelete(line, BREAKPOINT_MARKER);
2179  else if (marker & (1 << BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER))
2180  m_pControl->MarkerDelete(line, BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER);
2181  else
2182  m_pControl->MarkerAdd(line, BREAKPOINT_MARKER);
2183 }

2288 void cbEditor::RefreshBreakpointMarkers()
2289 {
2290  // First remove all breakpoint markers, then add the markers for the active debugger
2291  cbStyledTextCtrl *c = GetControl();
2292  int line = 0;
2293  while ((line = c->MarkerNext(line, (1 << BREAKPOINT_MARKER))) != -1)
2294  MarkerToggle(BREAKPOINT_MARKER, line);
2295 
2296  line = 0;
2297  while ((line = c->MarkerNext(line, (1 << BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER))) != -1)
2298  MarkerToggle(BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER, line);
2299 
2300  line = 0;
2301  while ((line = c->MarkerNext(line, (1 << BREAKPOINT_OTHER_MARKER))) != -1)
2302  MarkerToggle(BREAKPOINT_OTHER_MARKER, line);
2303 
2304  const DebuggerManager::RegisteredPlugins &plugins = Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->GetAllDebuggers();
2305  for (DebuggerManager::RegisteredPlugins::const_iterator it = plugins.begin(); it != plugins.end(); ++it)
2306  {
2307  const cbDebuggerPlugin *debugger = it->first;
2308  if (debugger == Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->GetActiveDebugger())
2309  {
2310  for (int ii = 0; ii < debugger->GetBreakpointsCount(); ++ii)
2311  {
2312  cb::shared_ptr<const cbBreakpoint> bp = debugger->GetBreakpoint(ii);
2313  if (bp->GetLocation() == GetFilename())
2314  {
2315  if (bp->IsEnabled())
2316  MarkerToggle(BREAKPOINT_MARKER, bp->GetLine() - 1);
2317  else
2318  MarkerToggle(BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER, bp->GetLine() - 1);
2319  }
2320  }
2321  }
2322  else
2323  {
2324  // all breakpoints for the non active debugger use the other breakpoint marker
2325  for (int ii = 0; ii < debugger->GetBreakpointsCount(); ++ii)
2326  {
2327  cb::shared_ptr<const cbBreakpoint> bp = debugger->GetBreakpoint(ii);
2328  if (bp->GetLocation() == GetFilename())
2329  MarkerToggle(BREAKPOINT_OTHER_MARKER, bp->GetLine() - 1);
2330  }
2331  }
2332  }
2333 }

2506 void cbEditor::MarkerNext(int marker)
2507 {
2508  int line = GetControl()->GetCurrentLine() + 1;
2509  int newLine = GetControl()->MarkerNext(line, 1 << marker);
2510 
2511  // Start from beginning if at last marker.
2512  if (newLine == -1)
2513  {
2514  line = 0;
2515  newLine = GetControl()->MarkerNext(line, 1 << marker);
2516 
2517  if (newLine != -1)
2518  InfoWindow::Display(_("Find bookmark action"), _("Reached the end of the document"), 1000);
2519  }
2520 
2521  if (newLine != -1)
2522  GotoLine(newLine);
2523 }

2525 void cbEditor::MarkerPrevious(int marker)
2526 {
2527  int line = GetControl()->GetCurrentLine() - 1;
2528  int newLine = GetControl()->MarkerPrevious(line, 1 << marker);
2529 
2530  // Back to last one if at first marker.
2531  if (newLine == -1)
2532  {
2533  line = GetControl()->GetLineCount();
2534  newLine = GetControl()->MarkerPrevious(line, 1 << marker);
2535 
2536  if (newLine != -1)
2537  InfoWindow::Display(_("Find bookmark action"), _("Reached the end of the document"), 1000);
2538  }
2539 
2540  if (newLine != -1)
2541  GotoLine(newLine);
2542 }

2551 
2552 void cbEditor::GotoMatchingBrace()
2553 {
2554  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
2555 
2556  // this works only when the caret is *before* the brace
2557  int matchingBrace = control->BraceMatch(control->GetCurrentPos());
2558 
2559  // if we haven't found it, we 'll search at pos-1 too
2560  if (matchingBrace == wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION)
2561  matchingBrace = control->BraceMatch(control->GetCurrentPos() - 1);
2562  else
2563  ++matchingBrace; // to keep the caret on the same side of the brace
2564 
2565  // else look for a matching preprocessor command
2566  if (matchingBrace == wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION)
2567  {
2568  wxRegEx ppIf(wxT("^[ \t]*#[ \t]*if"));
2569  wxRegEx ppElse(wxT("^[ \t]*#[ \t]*el"));
2570  wxRegEx ppEnd(wxT("^[ \t]*#[ \t]*endif"));
2571  wxRegEx pp(wxT("^[ \t]*#[ \t]*[a-z]*")); // generic match to get length
2572  if (ppIf.Matches(control->GetCurLine()) || ppElse.Matches(control->GetCurLine()))
2573  {
2574  int depth = 1; // search forwards
2575  for (int i = control->GetCurrentLine() + 1; i < control->GetLineCount(); ++i)
2576  {
2577  if (control->GetLine(i).Find(wxT('#')) != wxNOT_FOUND) // limit testing due to performance cost
2578  {
2579  if (ppIf.Matches(control->GetLine(i))) // ignore else's, elif's, ...
2580  ++depth;
2581  else if (ppEnd.Matches(control->GetLine(i)))
2582  --depth;
2583  }
2584  if (depth == 0)
2585  {
2586  pp.Matches(control->GetLine(i));
2587  matchingBrace = control->PositionFromLine(i) + pp.GetMatch(control->GetLine(i)).Length();
2588  break;
2589  }
2590  }
2591  }
2592  else if (ppEnd.Matches(control->GetCurLine()))
2593  {
2594  int depth = -1; // search backwards
2595  for (int i = control->GetCurrentLine() - 1; i >= 0; --i)
2596  {
2597  if (control->GetLine(i).Find(wxT('#')) != wxNOT_FOUND) // limit testing due to performance cost
2598  {
2599  if (ppIf.Matches(control->GetLine(i))) // ignore else's, elif's, ...
2600  ++depth;
2601  else if (ppEnd.Matches(control->GetLine(i)))
2602  --depth;
2603  }
2604  if (depth == 0)
2605  {
2606  pp.Matches(control->GetLine(i));
2607  matchingBrace = control->PositionFromLine(i) + pp.GetMatch(control->GetLine(i)).Length();
2608  break;
2609  }
2610  }
2611  }
2612  }
2613 
2614  // now, we either found it or not
2615  if (matchingBrace != wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION)
2616  {
2617  // move to the actual position
2618  control->GotoPos(matchingBrace);
2619  control->ChooseCaretX();
2620  // make nearby lines visible
2621  control->MakeNearbyLinesVisible(control->GetCurrentLine());
2622  }
2623 }
2624 
2625 void cbEditor::HighlightBraces()
2626 {
2627  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
2628 
2630  int currPos = control->GetCurrentPos();
2631  int newPos = control->BraceMatch(currPos);
2632  if (newPos == wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION)
2633  {
2634  if (currPos > 0)
2635  currPos--;
2636  newPos = control->BraceMatch(currPos);
2637  }
2638  wxChar ch = control->GetCharAt(currPos);
2639  if (ch == _T('{') || ch == _T('[') || ch == _T('(') ||
2640  ch == _T('}') || ch == _T(']') || ch == _T(')'))
2641  {
2642  if (newPos != wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION)
2643  {
2644  control->BraceHighlight(currPos, newPos);
2645  const int currColum = control->GetColumn(currPos);
2646  const int newColum = control->GetColumn(newPos);
2647  control->SetHighlightGuide((currColum < newColum) ? currColum :newColum);
2648  }
2649  else
2650  {
2651  control->BraceBadLight(currPos);
2652  }
2653  }
2654  else
2655  {
2656  control->BraceHighlight(-1, -1);
2657  }
2658 }
2659 
2660 int cbEditor::GetLineIndentInSpaces(int line) const
2661 {
2662  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
2663  int currLine = (line == -1)
2664  ? control->LineFromPosition(control->GetCurrentPos())
2665  : line;
2666  wxString text = control->GetLine(currLine);
2667  unsigned int len = text.Length();
2668  int spaceCount = 0;
2669  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i)
2670  {
2671  if (text[i] == _T(' '))
2672  {
2673  ++spaceCount;
2674  }
2675  else if (text[i] == _T('\t'))
2676  {
2677  spaceCount += control->GetTabWidth();
2678  }
2679  else
2680  {
2681  break;
2682  }
2683  }
2684  return spaceCount;
2685 }

2692 // Creates a submenu for a Context Menu based on the submenu's specific Id
2693 wxMenu* cbEditor::CreateContextSubMenu(long id)
2694 {
2695  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
2696  wxMenu* menu = nullptr;
2697  if (id == idInsert)
2698  {
2699  menu = new wxMenu;
2700  menu->Append(idEmptyMenu, _("Empty"));
2701  menu->Enable(idEmptyMenu, false);
2702  }
2703  else if (id == idEdit)
2704  {
2705  menu = new wxMenu;
2706  menu->Append(idUndo, _("Undo"));
2707  menu->Append(idRedo, _("Redo"));
2708  menu->Append(idClearHistory, _("Clear changes history"));
2709  menu->AppendSeparator();
2710  menu->Append(idCut, _("Cut"));
2711  menu->Append(idCopy, _("Copy"));
2712  menu->Append(idPaste, _("Paste"));
2713  menu->Append(idDelete, _("Delete"));
2714  menu->AppendSeparator();
2715  menu->Append(idUpperCase, _("UPPERCASE"));
2716  menu->Append(idLowerCase, _("lowercase"));
2717  menu->AppendSeparator();
2718  menu->Append(idSelectAll, _("Select all"));
2719 
2720  bool hasSel = control->GetSelectionEnd() - control->GetSelectionStart() != 0;
2721 
2722  menu->Enable(idUndo, control->CanUndo());
2723  menu->Enable(idRedo, control->CanRedo());
2724  menu->Enable(idClearHistory, control->CanUndo() || control->CanRedo());
2725  menu->Enable(idCut, !control->GetReadOnly() && hasSel);
2726  menu->Enable(idCopy, hasSel);
2727 
2728  if (platform::gtk) // a wxGTK bug causes the triggering of unexpected events
2729  menu->Enable(idPaste, !control->GetReadOnly());
2730  else
2731  menu->Enable(idPaste, !control->GetReadOnly() && control->CanPaste());
2732 
2733  menu->Enable(idDelete, !control->GetReadOnly() && hasSel);
2734  menu->Enable(idUpperCase, !control->GetReadOnly() && hasSel);
2735  menu->Enable(idLowerCase, !control->GetReadOnly() && hasSel);
2736  }
2737  else if (id == idBookmarks)
2738  {
2739  menu = new wxMenu;
2740  menu->Append(idBookmarksToggle, _("Toggle bookmark"));
2741  menu->Append(idBookmarksPrevious, _("Goto previous bookmark"));
2742  menu->Append(idBookmarksNext, _("Goto next bookmark"));
2743  menu->Append(idBookmarksClearAll, _("Clear all bookmarks"));
2744  }
2745  else if (id == idFolding)
2746  {
2747  menu = new wxMenu;
2748  menu->Append(idFoldingFoldAll, _("Fold all"));
2749  menu->Append(idFoldingUnfoldAll, _("Unfold all"));
2750  menu->Append(idFoldingToggleAll, _("Toggle all"));
2751  menu->AppendSeparator();
2752  menu->Append(idFoldingFoldCurrent, _("Fold current block"));
2753  menu->Append(idFoldingUnfoldCurrent, _("Unfold current block"));
2754  menu->Append(idFoldingToggleCurrent, _("Toggle current block"));
2755  }
2756  else
2757  menu = EditorBase::CreateContextSubMenu(id);
2758 
2759  return menu;
2760 }

2762 // Adds menu items to context menu (both before and after loading plugins' items)
2763 void cbEditor::AddToContextMenu(wxMenu* popup,ModuleType type,bool pluginsdone)
2764 {
2765  bool noeditor = (type != mtEditorManager);
2766  if (!pluginsdone)

2776  }

2778  {
2779  popup->Append(idInsert, _("Insert"), insert);
2780  popup->AppendSeparator();
2781  }

2790  popup->Append(idBookmarks, _("Bookmarks"), bookmarks);
2791  if (folding)
2792  popup->Append(idFolding, _("Folding"), folding);
2793  }
2794  else
2795  {
2796  if (!noeditor && !m_pData->GetUrl().IsEmpty())
2797  {

2801 
2802  wxMenu* splitMenu = new wxMenu;

2813  popup->Append(idSplit, _("Split view"), splitMenu);
2814

2816 
2817  if (Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetActiveProject()) // project must be open

2832  popup->Enable(idAddFileToProject, isAddRemoveEnabled);
2833  }

2838  if (insertitem)
2839  insert = insertitem->GetSubMenu();

2845  }
2846 }

2848 bool cbEditor::OnBeforeBuildContextMenu(const wxPoint& position, ModuleType type)
2849 {
2850  bool noeditor = (type != mtEditorManager);
2851  if (!noeditor && position!=wxDefaultPosition)
2852  {
2853  // right mouse click inside the editor
2854 
2855  // because here the focus has not switched yet (i.e. the left control has the focus,
2856  // but the user right-clicked inside the right control), we find out the active control differently...
2857  wxPoint clientpos(ScreenToClient(position));
2858  const int margin = m_pControl->GetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN) + // numbers, if present
2859  m_pControl->GetMarginWidth(C_MARKER_MARGIN) + // breakpoints, bookmarks... if present
2860  m_pControl->GetMarginWidth(C_FOLDING_MARGIN) + // folding, if present
2861  m_pControl->GetMarginWidth(C_CHANGEBAR_MARGIN); // changebar, if present
2862  wxRect r = m_pControl->GetRect();
2863 
2864  bool inside1 = r.Contains(clientpos);
2865 
2866  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = !m_pControl2 || inside1 ? m_pControl : m_pControl2;
2867 // control->SetFocus();
2868 
2869  clientpos = control->ScreenToClient(position);
2870  if (clientpos.x < margin)
2871  {
2872  // keep the line
2873  int pos = control->PositionFromPoint(clientpos);
2874  m_pData->m_LastMarginMenuLine = control->LineFromPosition(pos);
2875 
2876  // create special menu
2877  wxMenu* popup = new wxMenu;
2878 
2879  cbDebuggerPlugin *plugin = Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->GetActiveDebugger();
2880  if (plugin && plugin->SupportsFeature(cbDebuggerFeature::Breakpoints))
2881  {
2882  bool hasBreak = LineHasMarker(BREAKPOINT_MARKER, m_pData->m_LastMarginMenuLine);
2883  bool hasBreakDisabled = LineHasMarker(BREAKPOINT_DISABLED_MARKER, m_pData->m_LastMarginMenuLine);
2884 
2885  if (hasBreak || hasBreakDisabled)
2886  {
2887  popup->Append(idBreakpointEdit, _("Edit breakpoint"));
2888  popup->Append(idBreakpointRemove, _("Remove breakpoint"));
2889  if (hasBreak)
2890  popup->Append(idBreakpointDisable, _("Disable breakpoint"));
2891  if (hasBreakDisabled)
2892  popup->Append(idBreakpointEnable, _("Enable breakpoint"));
2893  }
2894  else
2895  popup->Append(idBreakpointAdd, _("Add breakpoint"));
2896  popup->AppendSeparator();
2897  }
2898 
2899  if (LineHasMarker(BOOKMARK_MARKER, m_pData->m_LastMarginMenuLine))
2900  {
2901  popup->Append(idBookmarkRemove, _("Remove bookmark"));
2902  }
2903  else
2904  {
2905  popup->Append(idBookmarkAdd, _("Add bookmark"));
2906  }
2907 
2908  popup->Append(idBookmarkRemoveAll, _("Remove all bookmark"));
2909 
2910  // display menu... wxWindows help says not to force the position
2911  PopupMenu(popup);
2912 
2913  delete popup;
2914  return false;
2915  }
2916 
2917  // before the context menu creation, move the caret to where mouse is
2918 
2919  // get caret position and line from mouse cursor
2920  const int pos = control->PositionFromPoint(control->ScreenToClient(wxGetMousePosition()));
2921 
2922  // this re-enables 1-click "Find declaration of..."
2923  // but avoids losing selection for cut/copy
2924  if (control->GetSelectionStart() > pos ||
2925  control->GetSelectionEnd() < pos)
2926  {
2927  control->GotoPos(pos);
2928  }
2929  }
2930 
2931  // follow default strategy
2932  return EditorBase::OnBeforeBuildContextMenu(position, type);
2933 }

2936 {
2937  // we don't care
2938 }
2939 
2940 void cbEditor::Print(bool selectionOnly, PrintColourMode pcm, bool line_numbers)
2941 {
2942  int oldMarginWidth = m_pControl->GetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN);
2943  int oldMarginType = m_pControl->GetMarginType(C_LINE_MARGIN);
2944 
2945  // print line numbers?
2946  m_pControl->SetMarginType(C_LINE_MARGIN, wxSCI_MARGIN_NUMBER);
2947  if (!line_numbers)
2948  {
2949  m_pControl->SetPrintMagnification(-1);
2950  m_pControl->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, 0);
2951  }
2952  else
2953  {
2954  m_pControl->SetPrintMagnification(-2);
2955  m_pControl->SetMarginWidth(C_LINE_MARGIN, 1);
2956  }
2957  // never print the gutter line
2958  m_pControl->SetEdgeMode(wxSCI_EDGE_NONE);
2959 
2960  switch (pcm)
2961  {
2962  case pcmAsIs:
2963  m_pControl->SetPrintColourMode(wxSCI_PRINT_NORMAL);
2964  break;
2965  case pcmBlackAndWhite:
2966  m_pControl->SetPrintColourMode(wxSCI_PRINT_BLACKONWHITE);
2967  break;
2968  case pcmColourOnWhite:
2969  m_pControl->SetPrintColourMode(wxSCI_PRINT_COLOURONWHITE);
2970  break;
2971  case pcmInvertColours:

3007 void cbEditor::OnContextMenuEntry(wxCommandEvent& event)
3008 {
3009  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
3010 
3011  // we have a single event handler for all popup menu entries,
3012  // so that we can add/remove options without the need to recompile
3013  // the whole project (almost) but more importantly, to

3117  {

3119  dialog->EditBreakpoint(m_Filename, m_pData->m_LastMarginMenuLine + 1);

3188 void cbEditor::OnEditorCharAdded(wxScintillaEvent& event)
3189 {
3190  // if message manager is auto-hiding, this will close it if not needed open
3191 // Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->Close();
3192 
3193  m_autoIndentDone = false;
3194  OnScintillaEvent(event); // smart indent plugins will be called here
3195  if (!m_autoIndentDone)
3196  {
3197  const wxChar ch = event.GetKey();
3198  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
3199  // auto indent
3200  if ( (ch == _T('\n')) || ( (control->GetEOLMode() == wxSCI_EOL_CR) && (ch == _T('\r')) ) )
3201  {
3202  const int pos = control->GetCurrentPos();
3203  const int currLine = control->LineFromPosition(pos);
3204  const bool autoIndent = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->ReadBool(_T("/auto_indent"), true);
3205  if (autoIndent && currLine > 0)
3206  {
3207  wxString indent;
3208  if (control->GetCurLine().Trim().IsEmpty())
3209  {
3210  // copy the indentation of the last non-empty line
3211  for (int i = currLine - 1; i >= 0; --i)
3212  {
3213  const wxString& prevLineStr = control->GetLine(i);
3214  if (!(prevLineStr.IsEmpty() || prevLineStr[0] == _T('\n') || prevLineStr[0] == _T('\r')))
3215  {
3216  indent = GetLineIndentString(i);
3217  break;
3218  }
3219  }
3220  }
3221  else
3222  indent = GetLineIndentString(currLine - 1);
3223  if (!indent.IsEmpty())
3224  {
3225  control->BeginUndoAction();
3226 
3227  control->InsertText(pos, indent);
3228  control->GotoPos(pos + indent.Length());
3229  control->ChooseCaretX();
3230 
3231  control->EndUndoAction();
3232  }
3233  }
3234  }
3235 
3236  // selection brace completion
3237  bool braceCompleted = false;
3238  if ( Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->ReadBool(_T("/selection_brace_completion"), false)
3239  || control->IsBraceShortcutActive() )
3240  {
3241  braceCompleted = control->DoSelectionBraceCompletion(ch);
3242  }
3243 
3244  // brace completion
3245  if ( !braceCompleted
3246  && Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->ReadBool(_T("/brace_completion"), true) )
3247  {
3248  control->DoBraceCompletion(ch);
3249  }
3250  }
3251 }

3258 void cbEditor::OnEditorDwellStart(wxScintillaEvent& event)
3259 {
3260  if ( !wxTheApp->IsActive() )
3261  return;
3262 
3263  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
3264  if (!control)
3265  return;
3266 
3267  wxRect screenRect = control->GetScreenRect();
3268  wxPoint ptEvent(event.GetX(), event.GetY());
3269  ptEvent = control->ClientToScreen(ptEvent);
3270  wxPoint ptScreen = wxGetMousePosition();
3271  wxPoint ptClient = control->ScreenToClient(ptScreen);
3272 
3273  double distance = sqrt( (ptScreen.x - ptEvent.x) * (ptScreen.x - ptEvent.x)
3274  + (ptScreen.y - ptEvent.y) * (ptScreen.y - ptEvent.y) );
3275  if (!screenRect.Contains(ptScreen) || distance > 10)
3276  return;
3277 
3278  int pos = control->PositionFromPoint(ptClient);
3279  int style = control->GetStyleAt(pos);
3280  NotifyPlugins(cbEVT_EDITOR_TOOLTIP, style, wxEmptyString, ptClient.x, ptClient.y);
3281  wxScintillaEvent newEvent(event);
3282  newEvent.SetX(ptClient.x);
3283  newEvent.SetY(ptClient.y);
3284  OnScintillaEvent(event);
3285 }

3293 void cbEditor::OnEditorModified(wxScintillaEvent& event)
3294 {
3295 // wxString txt = _T("OnEditorModified(): ");
3296 // int flags = event.GetModificationType();
3297 // if (flags & wxSCI_MOD_CHANGEMARKER) txt << _T("wxSCI_MOD_CHANGEMARKER, ");
3298 // if (flags & wxSCI_MOD_INSERTTEXT) txt << _T("wxSCI_MOD_INSERTTEXT, ");
3299 // if (flags & wxSCI_MOD_DELETETEXT) txt << _T("wxSCI_MOD_DELETETEXT, ");
3300 // if (flags & wxSCI_MOD_CHANGEFOLD) txt << _T("wxSCI_MOD_CHANGEFOLD, ");
3301 // if (flags & wxSCI_PERFORMED_USER) txt << _T("wxSCI_PERFORMED_USER, ");
3302 // if (flags & wxSCI_MOD_BEFOREINSERT) txt << _T("wxSCI_MOD_BEFOREINSERT, ");
3303 // if (flags & wxSCI_MOD_BEFOREDELETE) txt << _T("wxSCI_MOD_BEFOREDELETE, ");
3304 // txt << _T("pos=")
3305 // << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), event.GetPosition())
3306 // << _T(", line=")
3307 // << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), event.GetLine())
3308 // << _T(", linesAdded=")
3309 // << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), event.GetLinesAdded());
3310 // Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(txt);
3311 
3312  // whenever event.GetLinesAdded() != 0, we must re-set breakpoints for lines greater
3313  // than LineFromPosition(event.GetPosition())
3314  int linesAdded = event.GetLinesAdded();
3315  bool isAdd = event.GetModificationType() & wxSCI_MOD_INSERTTEXT;
3316  bool isDel = event.GetModificationType() & wxSCI_MOD_DELETETEXT;
3317  if ((isAdd || isDel) && linesAdded != 0)
3318  {
3319  // whether to show line-numbers or not is handled in SetLineNumberColWidth() now
3320  m_pData->SetLineNumberColWidth();
3321 
3322  // NB: I don't think polling for each debugger every time will slow things down enough
3323  // to worry about unless there are automated tasks that call this routine regularly
3324  //
3325  // well, scintilla events happen regularly
3326  // although we only reach this part of the code only if a line has been added/removed
3327  // so, yes, it might not be that bad after all
3328  int startline = m_pControl->LineFromPosition(event.GetPosition());
3329  if (m_pControl == event.GetEventObject())
3330  {
3331  const DebuggerManager::RegisteredPlugins &plugins = Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->GetAllDebuggers();
3332  cbDebuggerPlugin *active = Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->GetActiveDebugger();
3333  for (DebuggerManager::RegisteredPlugins::const_iterator it = plugins.begin(); it != plugins.end(); ++it)
3334  {
3335  if (it->first != active)
3336  it->first->EditorLinesAddedOrRemoved(this, startline + 1, linesAdded);
3337  }
3338  if (active)
3339  active->EditorLinesAddedOrRemoved(this, startline + 1, linesAdded);
3340 
3341  cbBreakpointsDlg *dlg = Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->GetBreakpointDialog();
3342  if (dlg)
3343  dlg->Reload();
3344  RefreshBreakpointMarkers();
3345  }
3346  }
3347  // If we remove the folding-point (the brace or whatever) from a folded block,
3348  // we have to make the hidden lines visible, otherwise, they
3349  // will no longer be reachable, until the editor is closed and reopened again
3350  if ( (event.GetModificationType() & wxSCI_MOD_CHANGEFOLD)
3351  && (event.GetFoldLevelPrev() & wxSCI_FOLDLEVELHEADERFLAG) )
3352  {
3353  cbStyledTextCtrl* control = GetControl();
3354  int line = event.GetLine();
3355  if (! control->GetFoldExpanded(line))
3356  {
3357  control->SetFoldExpanded(line, true);
3358  control->ShowLines(line, control->GetLastChild(line, -1));
3359  }
3360  }
3361  OnScintillaEvent(event);
3362 } // end of OnEditorModified
